SEARCH
Package src.login_system

Class Password

java.lang.Object
src.login_system.Password
public class Password extends Object
The Password class provides functionality for changing the password of a user. It includes a method to validate the current password, input a new password, and update the password in the data source.

The class is designed to work with both staff and student users and performs password change operations based on the user type.

Implementing classes should provide concrete implementations for the methods defined in this class.

2023-11-26

  • Method Details

    • change

      public static void change(User user)
      Changes the password for the specified user. Prompts the user to enter the current password and a new password. Validates the entered passwords and updates the user's password in the data source.
      Parameters:
      user - The user for whom the password needs to be changed.
